attributes.action: Remove the right of any MP to vote on legislation that will not apply in the constituency they represent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The contributions of Scottish and Welsh MP's to debate on matters that will affect only English constituencies could be valuable and should be allowed but they should not be allowed to vote. Matters which affect only England should be voted upon by English constituency MP's only.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
